definition: A designated area or location typically found in mountainous regions, where individuals engage in recreational activities involving snow and skiing. It is commonly used to refer to a specific region or resort that offers various ski slopes, facilities, and amenities for skiing enthusiasts.

examples.english: The ski resort is very large.

examples.german: Wir fahren jedes Jahr in ein neues Skigebiet.
examples.english: We go to a new ski resort every year.

examples.german: Das Skigebiet bietet viele Pisten für Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene.
examples.english: The ski resort offers many slopes for beginners and advanced skiers.

examples.german: In diesem Skigebiet gibt es auch eine Halfpipe für Snowboarder.
examples.english: This ski resort also has a halfpipe for snowboarders.

examples.german: Das Skigebiet liegt in den Alpen.
examples.english: The ski resort is located in the Alps.
